original_text: King Zedekiah said to Jeremiah, ‘I am afraid to do that. Some of Judah's people have gone out of the city to help Babylon's army. Babylon's officers might give me to them and they will be very cruel to me.’
korean_text: 시드기야 왕이 예레미야에게 이르되 나는 갈대아인에게 항복한 유다인을 두려워하노라 염려하건대 갈대아인이 나를 그들의 손에 넘기면 그들이 나를 조롱할까 하노라 하는지라

sentences.original_text: I am afraid to do that
Some of Judah's people have gone out of the city
Babylon's officers might give me to them
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 장교들이 나를 그들에게 넘겨줄지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: and they will be very cruel to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 나에게 매우 잔인할 것입니다
